revision.text: Some berries have special abilities, also called Auras. These auras often affect other berry growth and mutation, but others may affect other sections of the game. These auras are frequently used to help players find shiny pok√©mon or breed more efficiently. Here is a list of berry auras. The [[Enigma]] berry has a unique effect which is better explained on its page.
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
